GSD.description:
powerpc: Enable execve syscall exit tracepoint

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.286 by commit 8e27187a720ae9814e749ccf3b4d3e71431c26f5. For more details please see the references link.
